prompts: Create an adorable Electric-type Pokemon that has large ears and a lightning bolt tail.
I want a cute Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to live in grassy areas.
Generate a small, yellow creature that can generate electricity and is friendly with trainers.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small rodent, with bright eyes and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon with a round body and long ears, perfect for a starter in a new region.
Design a small Electric-type Pokemon that can be found in both urban and forest environments.
Show me a Pokemon with a signature move that involves thunder and a fluffy tail.
